extendedInfo.description: Buy gold and buy silver, and sell; track the gold price and silver price; view live gold price charts and gold markets, and for silver; manage your BullionVault account. The Official BullionVault App for Android from BullionVault, the worldâs largest online investment gold service, giving private investors from around the world access to professional gold bullion and silver bullion markets and live market data from their devices. You don't need a BullionVault account to: â¢ Track the gold rate and silver rate.â¢ View current gold price charts and silver price charts in US dollars, UK pounds or euros. (See price per troy ounce on in the charts in landscape view.)â¢ View BullionVaultâs live bullion-trading markets, available 24/7. Edit the markets to see only those of interest to you. â¢ Choose language setting from English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Spanish and Japanese. If youâre a BullionVault customer you can also:â¢ Login securely using your BullionVault account. â¢ Check your bullion and currency balances, and current valuation. â¢ Buy gold or buy silver instantly, secured in vaults in your choice of London, Zurich, New York or Singapore. â¢ Sell your bullion with no settlement delay. â¢ Trade gold and trade silver at any time.â¢ Review your order history, check the status of your orders and manage open orders. BullionVault is a full member of the LBMA (London Bullion Market Association) and is recommended and endorsed by the World Gold Council. BullionVault has won the Queen's Award for Enterprise twice.By downloading or using this app you are accepting BullionVaultâs Terms & Conditions and cookie/privacy policies, viewable on the BullionVault website.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Simple and does it\'s job.
reviews.author: Tim Frenzel

reviews.title: Good App!
reviews.comment: Market checkboxes don\'t initially work when you move to the edit page. Wait a few minutes and they do spring into life (?). Apart from that (problems selecting what you want to view), all in all a robust and useful app. Looking forward to a widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Non functional...
reviews.comment: I can login but then apart from Balance and Charts intermittently working non of the other menu buttons ever. do anything. Their text titles light up when you tap but nothing else happens. Not a functional app sadly. It worked on a SGS2 previously and was 5 stars then, please fix ASAP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow, won\'t go beyond startup screen
reviews.comment: Very slow to start-up. Seems to display prices OK on start-up screen, and will update by pulling down, but nothing else works. Clicking any menu button yields nothing, logging in doesn\'t change anything. The login screen\'s overlaid text entry boxes obscure the login button and can\'t be cleared away (have to scroll screen down to access it).  HTC Sensation XE, ICS 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent extension of BV service
reviews.comment: Very useful. Lets me trade and check balances and prices without having to be at my computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited units but good nonetheless
reviews.comment: It is good to have this if you don\'t have access to a PC.  There are 2 negatives. First, the support for ounces is limited. For example the graph right hand scale is in ounces but there are no values, except the floating current price. I\'d like to see an option for ounces in all the prices. Secondly, the text is too small and there is no way to increase it. Let\'s face it, the people who trade gold and silver are probably more mature in years than the average Android user. Bigger fonts please for no specs!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: At last you\'ve done it
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this. Minor issue on trying to edit currencies, the tick boxes don\'t all work. Tried on galaxy s2 and nexus 7. Happens on both. Want to get rid of dollars and Euros. The charting is fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Very slow, but even worse it looks like an iPhone app. Android devices are not iPhones, and your entire app breaches just about every recommendation Google make in their Android app design guidelines. Did your designers and developers even READ the Android design guidelines? *uninstalled*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hopelessly slow app unfortunately. It looks like it could be a useful app and interface seems good but please please get it to run faster!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: The touchscreen buttons need some improvement.. also not being able to see prices in $ per Oz is a major drawback..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow & unresponsive
reviews.comment: Very slow, glitches on menus and most features not working, including balance and trade. HTC Sensation / ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Really simple to use. Allows me to trade gold on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buy Gold and Silver 24/7
reviews.comment: Great charts, simple to use, now I trade my gold bullion any time, any place any where.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Really quick and simple to use on my S3..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does what you need, bit slow on my HTC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad performing app
reviews.comment: Uses a we view instead of a native experience.. otherwise useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I find the chart really useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Seriously poor attempt. No widgets. Slow even on s3. Bugs galore. Still, at least its official. Hopefully we will see updates. What\'s with the fake reviews????
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible/WorThless
reviews.comment: Terrible. WorThless app. ImpossIble to decIpher US dollars per ounce.  not made for the American investor.
reviews.author: A Google User
